name: places/ChIJ6eIWIqtZwokR1XTLqPkNFCw
formattedAddress: 1440 BROADWAY, FLOORS 1 & 2 ON THE CORNER OF, W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1440 BROADWAY, FLOORS 1 & 2 ON THE CORNER OF, W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: We had an amazing experience with Robert, NP at the minute clinic. We were visiting NY from out of town and my son needed to be seen for an ear infection. I’ve never seen a nurse practitioner have to do so many admin tasks (vitals, chief complaint, take co payment), do it with grace, while providing exceptional care. He even called our hotel to see if they could refrigerate our antibiotics since we didn’t have a mini fridge. As a health care worker myself, I was very pleased with the care and education provided while Robert seemed to be manning the whole clinic alone. It was busy, but that didn’t stop us from receiving great care. Thanks again for making our NY trip a little easier!

originalText.text: I went there for my flu shot (mmr) and booked an appointment after going there which was scheduled after an hour. But there wasn’t any patient so the doctor let me in. She was incredibly nice and helpful her name was Amalia if I’m not wrong. it was so nice and easy. Loved the environment. But the pharmacy areas employees are not so helpful and they’re unwilling to answer your questions.

originalText.text:
Never in my life have I EVER had a doctor so uncaring, selfish, and unprofessional! The entire thing was suspicious. NEVER go here for high quality care. If I could rate this 0 stars I would! If your team truly cares, then you need to start showing it because you have not shown me a single ounce!

My family and I are traveling. I came down with a pretty bad sore throat and later little bumps started to appear under my lip, legs, and hands. But the bottom of my feet and fingers were in SO much damn pain to the point where it was painful to hold anything and to walk. My arms were itchy.

So, we came in today, my sore throat was gone and my arms weren't itchy anymore. A woman came to get me. Never introduced herself, not even a name tag! I'm a teenager and my Mom was with me and the woman told my Mom to sit on the exam table and not the stool, because she would need to use the stool. (She never did.) She took my vitals, but not my blood pressure because I get anxious getting my blood pressure done.

After we waited back in the waiting room for a couple minutes, another woman came in. She was not friendly at all (the MA was) and she never introduced herself or wore a name tag. We had to ask her if she was the nurse practitioner because she never said who the hell she was! She was instant on taking my blood pressure even though I told her I get anxious while doing it. She told me it was required for treatment, when asked why, she said it was a “medical thing” and that if I didn’t get my blood pressure done we would have to go to urgent care. Then, she was complaining about how it “only takes a few seconds.” She looked 10 seconds at my toes, but did not examine anything at all before asking me if we’d been around little kids. We said “no.” Then, she fills in a prescription for the same cream and diagnoses me with hand, foot, and mouth DISEASE (HFMD) This condition mainly affects babies and toddlers, but I’m a teenager who’s been around NO babies or little kids! I am concerned for your other patients and no one should ever go here.

originalText.text:
NP, Luft was incredibly helpful and very knowledgeable about my skin condition, for which I visited the clinic. She was very helpful by accommodating me for my consultation. Somehow, my consultation was canceled, and she was nice enough to make the arrangement to see me without having to reschedule.
Not only was she helpful but she also was caring and patient with me as I explained my condition.
I would recommend her to all my friends and family.

originalText.text: I did the virtual waiting line but still ended up waiting for 30 min when I checked in 5 min prior to my appt time.  However,  the experience itself was very in and out and very efficient.  The nurse practitioner worked fast and had great rapport.  She answered all my questions and had my diagnosis (strep) and got my prescription ordered in less than 10 min with me being in the room. Glad I decided to make this stop on my vacation and it didn’t take away time from our trip at all.
